item.title: Unlocking and jailbreaking my iPhone 3gs on 4.1.2 - a little late
item.description: {% raw %} While I was away over the weekend, I borked my iphone.  I was running IOS 4.0, and I was having trouble with network connections. The statusbar wouldn't reflect my actual connection status.  WiFi connections would rarely show up in the statusbar, though I knew I was surfing wirelessly (my router at 10.10.10.1 was accessible to the phone, for starters...)WiFi would periodically crash.  In the middle of a good network connection, it would just.
